name: Tok

attributes.name: Died
values: Roughly six months before the Battle of Scarif

content: Tok was a male Rodian who lived on the holy moon Jedha prior to the Galactic Civil War. He was married to Steya, with whom he had a son, Althin. The family lived in Jedha City, where Tok and Steya owned a store. He and his wife were killed during an attack by Saw Gerrera's Partisans, roughly six months prior to the Battle of Scarif.
